text: 8.36-37: FG 10.47Ana mba bunin ana nzuav, mani verav kav, mbɨ mben hɨgi. Mani verav, mbɨn hav, mba Itiopia guma khaŋ Firip ga nzuai, “Ndu khar ganɨ, mbɨra khare. Thagɨn bigɨn na tuav mpɨrari, gu ruarɨ tharie?” 8.36-37 Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ kaŋgiap nta kheri gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, harigi buni mbari phorgap kha vezar ki. Mba buni khaŋ nzuai, “Firip khaŋ nzuai, ‘Ndu guigira won ndava vhen Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgɨp, ndu ana zɨn panan ruari.’ Firip nen ana nzuaim, ana khaŋ Firip ga nzuai, ‘Gu Zisas Krais khothɨgi ana Fhe Bakɨmen kam ma.’ ”
